thread.title: Neymar to Chelsea: La Liga expert discusses possible Barcelona transfer
thread.title_full: Neymar to Chelsea: La Liga expert discusses possible Barcelona transfer

title: Neymar to Chelsea: La Liga expert discusses possible Barcelona transfer
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Neymar to Chelsea: La Liga expert discusses possible Barcelona transfer GUILLEM BALAGUE has rubbished claims linking Chelsea with a surprise move for Barcelona star Neymar in the summer. PUBLISHED: 13:06, Sun, Mar 26, 2017 | UPDATED: 13:14, Sun, Mar 26, 2017 
It was reported this week that Chelsea owner Roman Abramovich had agreed a world record fee with Barcelona to sign Neymar in the summer. 
But Antonio Conte turned down the chance to sign the Brazilian superstar. 
The Chelsea boss is likely to be given a healthy transfer budget this summer with European football to contend with next season. GETTY Neymar will not be leaving Barcelona this summer, according to Guillem Balague GETTY Balague insists there is no truth in the rumours linking Neymar to Chelsea 
Chelsea have been linked with big money moves for Romelu Lukaku and James Rodriguez in the summer transfer window. 
But La Liga expert Balague doesn't expect anything to come from the rumours linking Chelsea with a move for Neymar. 
"Not at all," Balague said on Twitter. Not at all. He will be at Barcelona next season https://t.co/t2vIhT5J9D â€” Guillem Balague (@GuillemBalague) March 26, 2017 GETTY Roman Abramovich had reportedly agreed a deal in principle with Neymar Barcelona wages revealed: Which stars earn most? Fri, March 24, 2017
